rev.desc.rev.desc: Application was doing some inefficient DB i/o's in that:
1) When "save" button was pressed, it was always doing a delete-and-readd of the record. Changed this to do an update (rupdate).

2) When the OK button was pressed, it was always going through the update routine. Changed this so that if the record has NOT been changed, then it does NOT go through the update routine because it does not have to.

descript.descript: Application was doing some inefficient DB i/o's in that:
1) When "save" button was pressed, it was always doing a delete-and-readd of the record. Changed this to do an update (rupdate).

2) When the OK button was pressed, it was always going through the update routine. Changed this so that if the record has NOT been changed, then it does NOT go through the update routine because it does not have to.
